title: Frequently Asked Questions about COVID-19 Vaccines. Version 4, 7 April 2021
author: Pan American Health Organization
description: Frequently asked questions about vaccinations include issues such as vaccine efficacy and safety. This fourth edition responds to these and other questions. This document also discusses the different phases a vaccine must go through to obtain approval, and provides information on candidate vaccines and COVID-19 vaccinations.
